name: Hexagonal Iso-Path: Demons vs Angels
description:
This is a prototype digital version of a physical board game created by YouTube Creator Pocket83.

This version is local play only, meaning 2 players will need to take turns on the same device in order to play.

Pocket83's rules for the game can be found here:

Rule sheet #1:
http://postimg.cc/image/5sin82q1f/
Rule sheet #2:
http://postimg.cc/image/yjfgy4vv7/
Rule sheet #3:
http://postimg.cc/image/p05s4o8cz/

A video about the game's creation can be found here:

If there is demand, and if I find time, I will update this game with better graphics and audio, online networking to allow play across the Internet, and will release it for play on mobile devices.

This was more of a proof of concept, but should allow those who would like to try the game but don't have the time or resources to build a board a chance to play it.

If you run into any bugs, please let me know. I tried to cover all potential softlocks, but may have missed something.

Thanks!

-Cukeasaurus
